name: Contentful Buildkite Webhook
description: A Contentful webhook endpoint that creates Buildkite builds based on content events

AUTH_USERNAME.description: A username to protect the webhook

AUTH_PASSWORD.description: A password to protect the webhook

BUILDKITE_API_TOKEN.description: A Buildkite API Access Token with write_builds access (see https://buildkite.com/user/api-access-tokens)
